name: Chestnut v0.3
description: Upon completion of this fun game, we, the Industry, will ensure you and your family full compensation for any and all injuries sustained during gameplay, as well as a transfer of 500,000,000 credits to be deposited into an account of your choosing. Should you wish to make a donation to our company, we will provide you with a receipt for tax purposes. The Industry takes no responsibility for death, dismemberment or any other bodily injury sustained while playing. Should you, at any point, succumb to your injuries while playing the game, a complimentary plaque with an engraving of the name provided on your contestant sheet will be mailed to the address you've provided. Play safe, good luck, and have fun!
